struct asmjit::VarBits
#include <compiler.h>

Bit-array used by variable-liveness analysis.

Public Type

Anonymous enum

Values:

  • kEntitySize = static_cast<int>(sizeof(uintptr_t)) -
  • kEntityBits = kEntitySize * 8 -
